parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.24

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Arrays

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Reverses given array by reference (modifies the original array, just like [[resize]]). The alternative syntax can be used to reverse a ANSI [[String|string]]. If Unicode support is desired, see [[forceUnicode]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[reverse]] array

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> array: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[reverse]] string <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.02</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> string: [[String]] - String to be reversed

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]] - Reversed string
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_arr = [1,2,3];
[[reverse]] _arr;
[[hint]] [[str]] _arr; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>[3,2,1]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_wordArr = [[toArray]] "gateman";
[[reverse]] _wordArr;
[[hint]] [[toString]] _wordArr; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>nametag</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[reverse]] "treboR"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Returns "Robert"</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[set]], [[resize]], [[select]], [[in]], [[find]], [[toArray]], [[toString]], [[forEach]], [[count]], [[pushBack]], [[pushBackUnique]], [[apply]], [[append]], [[sort]], [[param]], [[params]], [[arrayIntersect]], [[splitString]], [[joinString]], [[forceUnicode]]
</value></part></template>
